alert.note: Alert for Morton; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:57AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Cannonball River at Breien affecting Morton and Sioux Counties... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Cannonball River at Breien. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water overflows north bank. At 12.0 feet, water overflows south bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Saturday /8:15 AM MDT Saturday/ the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold steady through Sunday morning, then gradually fall through the beginning of next week. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
